statements: SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_name, country FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_id, description FROM destinations WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM destinations WHERE country = 'Italy';
SELECT destination_name, country, cost FROM destinations ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM destinations WHERE country = 'Spain' ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT destination_name, country FROM destinations WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY destination_name ASC;
SELECT destination_id, destination_name, cost FROM destinations WHERE description LIKE '%beach%' ORDER BY destination_id;
SELECT * FROM destinations WHERE cost BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY country, destination_name;
SELECT destination_id, destination_name, country, cost FROM destinations WHERE destination_name LIKE 'S%' AND country = 'France' ORDER BY destination_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM destinations ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT destination_name, country FROM destinations WHERE city = 'Paris';
SELECT destination_name, city, description FROM destinations WHERE country = 'Italy';
SELECT * FROM itineraries WHERE traveler_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY travel_date ASC;
SELECT destination_name, city, country FROM destinations WHERE city = 'Tokyo' ORDER BY destination_id;
SELECT * FROM destinations WHERE country='France';
SELECT destination_name, city FROM destinations WHERE city='Paris';
SELECT destination_name, country, description FROM destinations WHERE destination_id=1;
SELECT * FROM itineraries WHERE traveler_name='Alice' ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT destination_name, country, city FROM destinations WHERE city='London' AND country='UK';
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_id, destination_name FROM destinations WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT destination_name, location FROM destinations ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM destinations WHERE location LIKE '%beach%';
SELECT destination_id, destination_name, rating FROM destinations WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY destination_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_name, location FROM destinations ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT destination_name, rating FROM destinations WHERE rating > 4 AND location = 'Europe';

SELECT destination_id, destination_name, COUNT(*) AS total_itineraries FROM destinations JOIN travel_itineraries ON destinations.destination_id = travel_itineraries.destination_id GROUP BY destinations.destination_id;

SELECT users.first_name, users.last_name, destinations.destination_name FROM users JOIN travel_itineraries ON users.user_id = travel_itineraries.user_id JOIN destinations ON travel_itineraries.destination_id = destinations.destination_id WHERE users.email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_name, location FROM destinations ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT destination_name, location, rating FROM destinations WHERE destination_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM itineraries ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM destinations ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM activities WHERE destination_id = 1;
SELECT destination_name, location FROM destinations WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT u.username, d.destination_name, i.start_date, i.end_date FROM users u JOIN itineraries i ON u.user_id = i.itinerary_id JOIN destinations d ON i.destination_id = d.destination_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_destinations FROM destinations;
SELECT * FROM destination;
SELECT destination_name, location FROM destination;
SELECT destination_name, description FROM destination WHERE destination_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM itinerary ORDER BY date_of_travel DESC;
SELECT activity_name, duration FROM activities WHERE destination_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM destination;
SELECT destination_name, location FROM destination WHERE destination_id = 1;
SELECT traveler_name, date_of_travel, destination_name FROM itinerary, destination WHERE itinerary.destination_id = destination.destination_id;
SELECT activity_name, duration, destination_name FROM activities, destination WHERE activities.destination_id = destination.destination_id ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT destination.destination_name, AVG(ratings.rating_value) AS avg_rating FROM destination, ratings WHERE destination.destination_id = ratings.destination_id GROUP BY destination.destination_id;
